scripts.build:lib: cd ../@misk/common; npm run build; rm -rf ./node_modules; cd ../../main; cp -r ../@misk ./node_modules/; for d in ../modules/*/; do cp -r ../@misk $d/node_modules/; done
scripts.build:modules: for d in ../modules/*/; do webpack --production --config $d/webpack.production.config.js; done; cp ../build/js/module_* ./src/core/components/
scripts.build: npm run build:lib; npm run build:modules; npm run build:main
scripts.start:modules: for d in ../modules/*/; do webpack --config $d/webpack.development.config.js; done; cp ../build/js/module_* ./src/core/components/
scripts.start:all: npm run build:lib; npm run start:modules; npm run start:main
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && webpack-dev-server --production --config ./webpack.production.config.js
scripts.restart: npm run clean && npm run start:all
scripts.start-old: npm run build && npm run serve-only
scripts.reinstall:modules: for d in ../modules/*/; do bash -c "cd $d; rm -rf node_modules; yarn install"; done
scripts.reinstall: npm run reinstall:main && npm run reinstall:lib && npm run reinstall:modules
